DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if advanced prostate cancer patients that are treated with radiotherapy (RT) plus ipilimumab live longer that those treated with RT alone
DOC.brief_title: Study of Immunotherapy to Treat Advanced Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com. Advanced prostate cancer At least 1 bone metastasis Testosterone < 50 ng/dl Prior treatment with docetaxel Brain metastasis Autoimmune disease Known HIV, Hep B, or Hep C infection More than 2 prior systemic anticancer regimens for prostate cancer Prior treatment on BMS CA180227 for prostate cancer
